trans-unit.source: Serializes or deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, to or from the body of a Message Queuing message, using a binary format.
The <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> is very efficient and can be used to serialize most objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>是非常高效，可用于序列化大多数对象。

trans-unit.source: The result is very compact and fast to parse, but does not allow for loosely coupled messaging as the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> does.
trans-unit.target: 结果是非常紧凑且快速进行分析、 但不允许的松散耦合的消息传递作为<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>未。

trans-unit.source: Loosely coupled means that the client and the server can independently version the type that is sent and received.
trans-unit.target: 松耦合的意味着客户端和服务器独立可以发送和接收的类型版本。

trans-unit.source: When the application sends a message to the queue using an instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> class, the formatter serializes the object into a stream and inserts it into the message body.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序发送一条消息到使用的实例的队列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>类，格式化程序对象序列化为流，并将它插入到消息正文。

trans-unit.source: When reading from a queue using a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, the formatter deserializes the message data into the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property of a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: 从队列使用读取时<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，格式化程序反序列化到消息数据<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>属性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> provides faster throughput than the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> 提供更快吞吐量要高于<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> when pure speed rather than loosely coupled messaging is desired.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>当纯速度而不是松散耦合的消息传递需要时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class without specifying a type style or top object assembly style.

You must specify values for the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A> property (which defines how the root object in a graph is laid out) and the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A> property (which defines how object type descriptions are laid out) before using an instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> class to serialize and send a message.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定值<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A>属性 （用于定义关系图中的根对象的布局方式） 和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A>属性 （用于定义对象类型描述如何布局） 之前使用的实例<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>类序列化并发送一条消息。

trans-unit.source: Determines how the top (root) object of a graph is laid out in the serialized stream.
Determines how type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class, specifying the formats of the root object and the type descriptions.
The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> to inspect.
Determines whether the formatter can deserialize the contents of the message.
<see langword="true" /> if the binary message formatter can deserialize the message; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A> returns `false` if the message body is not a binary object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A> 返回`false`如果消息正文不是一个二进制对象。

trans-unit.source: On the receiving computer, <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A> returns `true` if the assembly for the class to be deserialized exists locally.
trans-unit.target: 在接收计算机上，<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A>返回`true`如果本地存在类的程序集，要反序列化。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must be found in the global assembly cache, or be linked to the application (for example, if the object represents a custom class).
trans-unit.target: 程序集必须在全局程序集缓存中，找到或链接到应用程序 （例如，如果该对象表示的自定义类）。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="message" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.

Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class whose read/write properties (the root object and type description formats) are the same as the current <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" />.
An object whose properties are identical to those of this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" />, but whose metadata does not specify it to be a formatter class instance.
This method creates a copy of the formatter and initializes all its properties to the values of this <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建一份格式化程序，并初始化所有其属性设置为此值<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: It is used for scalability, but does not guarantee read or write thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 用于可伸缩性，但不保证读取或写入线程安全性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />, in binary format, to deserialize.
Reads the contents from the given message and creates an object that contains the deserialized message.
The deserialized message.
Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。

trans-unit.source: The body of the message must be in binary format, and the same serializer must be used to deserialize the message as that which initially serialized it.
trans-unit.target: 消息的正文必须采用二进制格式，并且必须使用相同的序列化程序进行反序列化形式，最初序列化的消息。

trans-unit.source: If the body represents a custom class, the assembly for that class must exist locally.
trans-unit.target: 如果正文表示自定义类，该类的程序集必须位于本地。

trans-unit.source: The message's <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.BodyType" /> property does not indicate a binary object.
The <paramref name="message" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets a value that defines how the top (root) object of a graph is deserialized with regards to finding and loading its assembly.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle" /> values that defines the deserialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: 之一<see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle" />定义反序列化行为的值。

trans-unit.source: Currently, you should accept the default value, `AssemblyStyle`.
trans-unit.target: 目前，你应该接受默认值， `AssemblyStyle`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that defines how type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterTypeStyle" /> that defines the type description format.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterTypeStyle" /> ，它定义类型说明格式。

trans-unit.source: Currently, you should accept the default value, `TypesWhenNeeded`.
trans-unit.target: 目前，你应该接受默认值， `TypesWhenNeeded`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Body" /> property will contain the serialized object.
The object to be serialized into the message body.
Serializes an object into the body of the message.
The top object format and type format need not be specified to write to the queue as they must be when reading.
trans-unit.target: 顶级对象格式和类型格式无需指定要写入队列，因为它们必须在读取时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A> properties are used by the formatter only when deserializing a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A>仅在反序列化消息时，格式化程序使用属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> can serialize most objects, but the result is not loosely coupled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>可以序列化大多数对象，但结果不松散耦合。

trans-unit.source: However, it is compact, so the formatter is efficient for large objects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它是 compact，因此格式化程序是有效的大型对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="message" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
